me anuwa uthure hiyumenteriyan dimayinin sidu kota atha.mehidi janathawata awashya nidahasa uparima lesa himi wana paridi aarakshawa siyayata dahasayakin sahathika kota janathawa nawatha mul gambim labadimata rajaya kriya kaleya.eksath jathinge saranagathayin pilibanda soya balana komisan sabhawe sahathikaya lada idamwala pamanak janathawa padinchi kirimata rajaya kriya kaleya.uthure adhi aarakshitha kalapawala pawa dan krama kramayen bim bomba iwath kota janathawa padinchi karawimata rajaya thiranaya kota atha.melesa janathawa yali padinchi karana athara owunta jiwanopaya nanga sitawima sandaha krushikarmanthayata, saththwa nishpadanayata, dhiwara katayuthuwalata ha swayanrakiya karmantha, sewa sidu kirimata rajaya wiwidha aayathana haraha sahayan laba di thibe.
